user

Class MakeReservationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • user.MakeReservationController

  • public class MakeReservationController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for the MakeReservation window. Contains methods for adding to the reservations database based on the user's seat selection.

      • changeGraphic

        public void changeGraphic(Chairs chair)
        When graphic (chair) is clicked on the icon changes. If it has been booked by a previous user the colour and booking status will not change and it will continue to display as red. If unbooked seat is selected by current user seat will turn yellow If unbooked seat is deselected by current user it will go back to green
        Parameters:
        chair -

      • clickToBook

        public void clickToBook(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        When a chair is clicked the image is changed according to the change graphic method
        Parameters:
        event -

      • reserve

        public void reserve(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
             throws java.io.IOException
        When Button is pressed it is checked if the seat has already been booked. If it has not a new reservation is made in the 'reservationsDatabase' setting the 'userID', 'screeingID' and 'seatID'. The window is then closed. If the booking is a success a new booking confirmation window is displayed showing details of the booking.
        Parameters:
        e -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • setUser

        public void setUser(java.lang.String user)
             throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                    java.sql.SQLException
        The 'UserDatabase' is queried. Taking a user as an argument it outputs the 'userID'
        Parameters:
        user -
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.sql.SQLException
